English.Text: "I have just the tonic!" your wild-eyed doctor quavers, pulling a bottle of Vin Mariani from his satchel. However, the mix of wine and coca leaves only serves to heighten the delirium. Some awaken from incoherence, others don't. The Flower-eaters are clearly puzzled, and offer their condolences, for no concoction so ill-advised or unfortunate, has ever been seen before or since.
